Sharing a desk and internet

19 January 2011

After two months in the new office, I realized we’re going to need to a lot more stuff to fill up the space: couch, big screen, etc. You know, the essentials?

Then I realized I could just bring in a new desk and offer up the space/internet for people who are passing through. Especially, since there are no coworking spaces in Traverse City.

So if you’re in or around Traverse City / Elk Rapids, feel free to stop by. I do ask that you sign in through DesksNearMe beforehand so we don’t overcommit the space.
